# tsuga_ingestion_api_key (Resource)

An ingestion API key used to send telemetry data to Tsuga.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "tsuga_ingestion_api_key" "example" {
  name  = "production-logs-ingestion"
  owner = "abc-123-def"

  tags = [
    {
      key   = "env"
      value = "prod"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `owner` (String)

### Optional

- `tags` (Attributes List) List of key/value tags applied to the resource (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tags))
- `team_override_fields` (List of String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `key` (String, Sensitive) The full API key value. Only available at creation time; not retrievable afterwards.
- `key_last_characters` (String)

### Nested Schema for `tags`

Required:

- `key` (String)
- `value` (String)
